content: Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in the frigid mountains of The New West, where the devious Yellowbrow has taken control of one of the Great Sage's six senses for his own ends.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3-White_Snow,_Ice_Cold.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Walkthrough Sections'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in the frigid mountains of The New West, where the devious Yellowbrow has taken control of one of the Great Sage's six senses for his own ends.
